Preface - About This Book / Conventions Used in This Book

Special Fonts

All code listings, reserved words, and the names of actual data structures, constants, fields, parameters, and routines are shown in Courier (this
is Courier).

Words that appear in boldface are key terms or concepts and are defined in
the Glossary.
